name: luxor
0:
”Alexa ask luxor to turn on the lights”
”Alexa ask luxor to turn off the lights”
”Alexa ask luxor for help”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: luxor
des: Luxor Alexa Skill enables voice control for your Alexa devices to control FX Luminaire outdoor lighting. In order to use the skill you have to own Luxor Controller 2.0. You need to enable the cloud functionality on your Luxor app in the settings menu and setup the site(s) and controller(s) through the Luxor App on your phone or tablet.
